Test that text-shadow doesn't mess up the line positions.

line
line
FAIL:
Expected 220 for offsetLeft, but got 0. 
Expected 0 for offsetTop, but got 20. 

<span class="testee" data-offset-y="0" data-offset-x="220">line</span>
FAIL:
Expected 0 for offsetTop, but got -1. 

<span class="testee" data-offset-y="0" data-offset-x="0">line</span>
